title: 변중무
content:
변중무는
한양대학교
서울캠퍼스
공과대학
자원환경공학과
교수이자,
물리탐사연구실
장을 겸임하고 있다.
자원환경공학과 홈페이지 참고(2019.10.)
목차
1
학력
2
경력
2.1
PROFESSIONAL ORGANIZATION ACTIVITIES
3
연구관심분야
4
연구 성과
5
각주
학력
2000 Ph.D in Applied Geophysics, University of California at Berkeley
1993 M.S in Exploration Geophysics, Seoul National University
1991 B.S in Dept. of Petroleum and Mineral Eng., Seoul National Univers
경력
07/2019 – Present Associate Dean (Research), Department of Earth Resources and Environmental Engineering, Hanyang University, Seoul, Korea
01/2019 – Present Vice president, Vice president, Korean Society of Earth and Exploration Geophysicists (KSEG), Korea
12/2017 – Present Managing Director, Department of Earth Resources and Environmental Engineering, Hanyang University, Seoul, Korea
03/2016 – Present Professor, Department of Earth Resources and Environmental Engineering, Hanyang University, Seoul, Korea
03/2015 – Present Department Chair, Department of Earth Resources and Environmental Engineering, Hanyang University, Seoul, Korea
03/2011 – 02/2016 Associate Professor, Department of Earth Resources and Environmental Engineering, Hanyang University, Seoul, Korea
03/2009 – 02/2011 Department Chair, Department of Natural Resources and Geoenvironmental Engineering, Hanyang University, Seoul, Korea
03/2005 – 02/2011 Assistant Professor, Department of Natural Resources and Geoenvironmental Engineering, Hanyang University, Seoul, Korea
03/2004 – 02/2005 Full-time Lecturer, Major in Geosystem Engineering, Kangwon National University, Chunchon, Korea
10/2002 – 02/2004 Postdoctoral fellow, Massachusetts Institute of Technology, Cambridge, MA, USA
09/2001 – 09/2002 Scientist, SensorWise, Inc. (Research & Development company of acoustic logging), Houston, TX, USA
09/2001 – 09/2002 Adjunct Professor, Department of Geosciences, University of Houston, Houston, TX, USA
09/2000 – 08/2001 Research Assistant Professor, Allied Geophysical Laboratories, Department of Geosciences, University of Houston, Houston, TX, USA
09/2000 – 08/2001 Research Consultant, TomoSeis (Crosswell seismic company of Corelab), Houston, TX, USA
PROFESSIONAL ORGANIZATION ACTIVITIES
01/2014 – Present Executive committee member, The Korean Society of Mineral and Energy Resources Engineers
01/2011 – Present Country representative, Society of Exploration Geophysicists (SEG), U.S.A.
01/2009 – Present Associate editor, ‘Exploration Geophysics’, ASEG, Australia
02/2008 – Present Faculty advisor, Committee on University and Student Programs of SEG, U.S.A.
06/2007 – Present Executive committee member, Korean society of earth and exploration geophysicists
01/2006 – 12/2015 Editorial board, The Korean society for geosystem engineering
03/2004 – 02/2011 Editorial board, Korean society of earth and exploration geophysicists
01/2007 – 12/2010 Editorial board, Korea society of economic and environmental geology
01/2006 – 12/2008 Country representative, Society of Exploration Geophysicists (SEG), U.S.A.
연구관심분야
물리탐사
연구 성과
과학기술정보통신부·한국과학기술기획평가원(KISTEP) 선정 '2021년 국가연구개발 우수성과 100선'(에너지 환경 분야)-'기계학습 기술에 기반한 지하 정밀탐사 기술 개발 및 사업화'
